channel.title: How to make NPC's hit higher or lower?
channel.description: ok. . .so i deleted the general in my 317 server right? well i replaced him with a monk but i want the monk to hit high so he is as hard to kill but i dont know how to change his hits. . . :confused:

item.title: How to make NPC's hit higher or lower?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:4, topic:308110”]i knew it was something like that…
lol
i have a tendancy to get names mixed up.
thanks for correecting[/quote]

not a problem dude.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make NPC's hit higher or lower?
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:2, topic:308110”]look in your .cfg files

open them using Notepad.

your best bet would be npc.cfg[/quote]

Npc.cfg isn’t for their max hits, that’s NpcHandler class.
